longBusinessSummary: BOE Technology Group Company Limited, operates display, Internet of Things (IoT) innovation, sensor, MLED, and smart medicine & engineering business worldwide. The Display Business segment design and manufacture display devices and strives including TFT-LCD, AMOLED, micro display, and other intelligent interface devices. Its IoT Innovation Business segment integrates manufacturing models for system solution design, which provides smart terminal products to TVs, monitors, laptops, tablet PCs, low power consumption products, IoT, 3D displays, etc. The Sensor Business segment design and manufacture sensor devices and system solution services including flat panel X-ray detectors, digital microfluidic chips, PDLC glass, fingerprint identification systems, industrial sensors, etc. for various fields including medical bio detection, transportation and construction, consumer electronics, microwave communication, and industrial sensing application. Its MLED Business segment provides Mini-LED backlight products for smartphones, tablet PCs, laptops, monitors, TVs, car displays, wearables, and other products; and Mini/Micro-LED display products for the usage of outdoor, commercial, transparent, special, and other display application. The Smart Medicine and Engineering Business segment provides professional healthcare services by integrating engineering technology and medical science primarily focus on family, community and hospital, connecting testing equipment, and medical personnel; and offers health IoT platform, which includes constructing intelligent health administrative ecosystem, and full-chained health services. In addition, it engages in technical development and patent maintenance service. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. BOE Technology Group Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Beijing Electronics Holdings Co., Ltd.
